properties.areaDesc: Washington County; Logan County; Larimer County Below 6000 Feet/Northwest Weld County; Morgan County; Northeast Weld County
properties.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 6 at 8:26AM MST until January 6 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Denver CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph
expected.

* WHERE...Northeast Weld County, Logan County, Washington
County, Morgan County and Larimer County Below 6000
Feet/Northwest Weld County.

* WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will blow around unsecured objects.
Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may
result. Travel will be difficult for high profile vehicles.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing dust may will restrict
visiblities at times.
properties.instruction:
Strong winds may lead to property damage. Hazardous driving
conditions due to powerful cross winds will pose a serious risk
for drivers, especially for light weight and high profile
vehicles. Loose outdoor items should be brought inside or secured
properly.

NWSheadline: HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON
